title: Bitstream Vera with Polish letters
content:
Hi, you need Bitstream Vera which has Polish letters (ąćęłńśźż).

It seems to be a preview

`
ąćęłńśźż
`

but DejaVu Sans supports Google Translation.
author: 386sky

comments.content: What about the [DejaVu](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201120022/http:/dejavu-fonts.org/wiki/index.php?title=Main_Page) fonts doesn't work for you?
